Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketAddtlITSMField
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###003-ITSMTicket
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketDecision
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Module::AgentTicketDecision###003-ITSMTicket
Setting.Description: Loader module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###315-AddtlITSMField
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to modify additional ITSM fields in the ticket zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###420-Decision
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to change the decision of a ticket in its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the additional ITSM field screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###RequiredLock
Setting.Description: Defines if a ticket lock is required in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###TicketType
Setting.Description: Sets the ticket type in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Service
Setting.Description: Sets the service in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###ServiceMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if service must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###SLAMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if SLA must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Queue
Setting.Description: Sets the queue in the ticket responsible screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###QueueMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if queue must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Owner
Setting.Description: Sets the ticket owner in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###OwnerMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if ticket owner must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Responsible
Setting.Description: Sets the ticket responsible in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###ResponsibleMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if ticket responsible must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###State
Setting.Description: If a note is added by an agent, sets the state of a ticket in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###StateMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if state must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###StateType
Setting.Description: Defines the next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###StateDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Note
Setting.Description: Allows adding notes in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###NoteMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if note must be filled in by the agent. Can be overwritten by Ticket::Frontend::NeedAccountedTime.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Subject
Setting.Description: Defines the default subject of a note in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Body
Setting.Description: Defines the default body of a note in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###InvolvedAgent
Setting.Description: Shows a list of all the involved agents on this ticket, in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###InformAgent
Setting.Description: Shows a list of all the possible agents (all agents with note permissions on the queue/ticket) to determine who should be informed about this note, in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###IsVisibleForCustomerDefault
Setting.Description: Defines if the note in the ticket note screen of the agent interface is visible for the customer by default.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Priority
Setting.Description: Shows the ticket priority options in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###PriorityDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default ticket priority in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###Title
Setting.Description: Shows the title fields in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###FormDraft
Setting.Description: Allows to save current work as draft in the ticket note screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###HistoryType
Setting.Description: Defines the history type for the additional ITSM field screen action, which gets used for ticket history.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###HistoryComment
Setting.Description: Defines the history comment for the additional ITSM field screen action, which gets used for ticket history.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketAddtlITSMField###ShowIncidentState
Setting.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the decision screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###RequiredLock
Setting.Description: Defines if a ticket lock is required in the decision screen of the agent interface (if the ticket isn't locked yet, the ticket gets locked and the current agent will be set automatically as its owner).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###TicketType
Setting.Description: Sets the ticket type in the decision screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Type needs to be activated).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Service
Setting.Description: Sets the service in the decision screen of the agent interface (Ticket::Service needs to be activated).

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###ServiceMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if service must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###SLAMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if SLA must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Queue
Setting.Description: Sets the queue in the ticket note screen of a zoomed ticket in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###QueueMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if queue must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Owner
Setting.Description: Sets the ticket owner in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###OwnerMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if ticket owner must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Responsible
Setting.Description: Sets the ticket responsible in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###ResponsibleMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if ticket responsible must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###State
Setting.Description: If a note is added by an agent, sets the state of a ticket in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###StateMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if state must be selected by the agent.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###StateType
Setting.Description: Defines the next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###StateDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default next state of a ticket after adding a note, in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Note
Setting.Description: Allows adding notes in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###NoteMandatory
Setting.Description: Sets if note must be filled in by the agent. Can be overwritten by Ticket::Frontend::NeedAccountedTime.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Subject
Setting.Description: Defines the default subject of a note in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Body
Setting.Description: Defines the default body of a note in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###InvolvedAgent
Setting.Description: Shows a list of all the involved agents on this ticket, in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###InformAgent
Setting.Description: Shows a list of all the possible agents (all agents with note permissions on the queue/ticket) to determine who should be informed about this note, in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###IsVisibleForCustomerDefault
Setting.Description: Defines if the note in the ticket note screen of the agent interface is visible for the customer by default.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Priority
Setting.Description: Shows the ticket priority options in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###PriorityDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default ticket priority in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###Title
Setting.Description: Shows the title fields in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###FormDraft
Setting.Description: Allows to save current work as draft in the ticket note screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###HistoryType
Setting.Description: Defines the history type for the decision screen action, which gets used for ticket history.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###HistoryComment
Setting.Description: Defines the history comment for the decision screen action, which gets used for ticket history.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the decision screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketDecision###ShowIncidentState
Setting.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMTicketFirstLevelSolutionRate
Setting.Description: Enables the stats module to generate statistics about the average of ITSM ticket first level solution rate.

Setting.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMTicketSolutionTimeAverage
Setting.Description: Enables the stats module to generate statistics about the average of ITSM ticket solution.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPhone###ShowIncidentState
Setting.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketEmail###ShowIncidentState
Setting.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketClose###ShowIncidentState
Setting.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketFreeText###ShowIncidentState
Setting.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketNote###ShowIncidentState
Setting.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketOwner###ShowIncidentState
Setting.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketPending###ShowIncidentState
Setting.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

Setting.Description: Defines if the service incident state should be shown during service selection in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ACLKeysLevel3::Actions###100-Default-ITSM
Setting.Description: Defines which items are available for 'Action' in third level of the ACL structure.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentITSMIncidentProblemManagement
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPost###ITSMIncidentProblemManagement
Setting.Description: Modifies the display order of the dynamic field ITSMImpact and other things.
